title: Biden and Trump Rhetoric, Tariffs, 2020
itunes:title: Biden and Trump Rhetoric, Tariffs, 2020
description:
Guests: Marc Ross, founder of Caracal Global, Louise Schiavone, Journalist and Senior Lecturer at Johns Hopkins University Carey Business School, Ryan Teague Beckwith, Bloomberg News National Political Correspondent. David Bahnsen, Founder, Managing Partner, and Chief Investment Officer of The Bahnsen Group discussed the recent market plunges and trade war uncertainty.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
